column3: Lancashire School of Business and Enterprise
column5: Our innovative online MSc in Digital Marketing Communications is the first of its kind in the UK and will provide you with cutting-edge knowledge in Digital and Social Media Marketing which can enhance your future career prospects.Digital Marketing is an area that is constantly evolving and growing and there is an industry requirement for well-qualified individuals in this field.Our online course primarily focuses on the knowledge required to take on a specialist role in Digital Marketing in a variety of organisations. It will provide you with both digital and creative skills to enhance your future career prospects.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: Full-time: One year. Part-time: Three years.
